§§ 2401 to 2405. Repealed. Pub. L. 105–332, § 6(b)(3), Oct. 31, 1998, 112 Stat. 3128
Section 2401, Pub. L. 102–325, title XV, § 1511, July 23, 1992, 106 Stat. 831, stated purpose of chapter.
Section 2402, Pub. L. 102–325, title XV, § 1512, July 23, 1992, 106 Stat. 831, authorized establishment of National Center for the Workplace.
Section 2403, Pub. L. 102–325, title XV, § 1513, July 23, 1992, 106 Stat. 832, related to use of funds.
Section 2404, Pub. L. 102–325, title XV, § 1514, July 23, 1992, 106 Stat. 833, related to gifts and donations.
Section 2405, Pub. L. 102–325, title XV, § 1515, July 23, 1992, 106 Stat. 833, authorized appropriations.
